1527810.name: Ambient Channels: Zanfium Tower - Lounge
1527810.description:
The Zanifum Tower - Lounge episode adds our new Causal (desktop) VR mode "Zanfium". In the Zanfium mode, you can interact with appliances and objects to spawn new items like sushi and desserts. It also adds our first Multiplayer mode (w/voice) which allows you to hang out with up to 4 people in the lounge and interact with the items to have a VR dinner/dessert experience.

Stay tuned, we'll be investing heavily in the new VR mode including adding animations and abilities like sitting on furniture, etc.



Note: The video feed in the Tower Lounge is running from an http stream. You can turn it off by selecting the "no video" ambiance chapter or you can turn it off when you're in FPS mode by clicking on the wall plate by the front room TV.

You can currently play Zanfium Tower - Lounge for free in Ambient Channels

This episode is part of the Ambient Channels: Collector's Pass 2020/2021
